page.title: 07THE CHILDREN OF CLASS 4
page.content: In our class there are 37 children.20 are leaving today,July 19 1985, to go to the Comprehensive School next term.Helen Drummond is going to York College for girls.The other 16 will still be in this class next year. Most children were born in December(8).The most common hair colour is dark blonde(11),followed closely by dark brown.The main eye colour is blue(13),and hazel is second. Our favourite singer is Shakin' Stevens(10) votes followed by Nik Kershaw(7).Knight Rider is our favourite T.V. Programme it is about a computerised car. Most people get the Yorkshire Evening Press(22)the newspaper Sun is second.
